\doxysubsection*{Classes}
\begin{DoxyCompactItemize}
\item 
struct \mbox{\hyperlink{structaurora_1_1_calibration_data}{aurora\+::\+Calibration\+Data}}
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Calibration data container for Aurora This data is calibrated from the Qu-\/\+Bit default Aurora firmware. It is advised not to save over this data unless you are prepared to recalibrate. \end{DoxyCompactList}\item 
class \mbox{\hyperlink{classaurora_1_1_hardware}{aurora\+::\+Hardware}}
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em \mbox{\hyperlink{classaurora_1_1_hardware}{Hardware}} support class for the Qu-\/\+Bit Aurora This should be created, and intitialized at the beginning of any program before running anything else. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}

\doxysubsection*{Variables}
\begin{DoxyCompactItemize}
\item 
daisy\+::\+USBHost\+Handle \mbox{\hyperlink{namespaceaurora_add63f29f2efd87c1754e7add264350e8}{aurora\+::usb}}
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em global USB host handle accessor This is left global so that it is guaranteed to be within the AXI SRAM with the aurora\+\_\+sram.\+lds linker file. \end{DoxyCompactList}\item 
daisy\+::\+Fat\+FSInterface \mbox{\hyperlink{namespaceaurora_a300b1377a387f60ff447c08d7a747877}{aurora\+::fatfs\+\_\+interface}}
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em global accessor to the Fat\+FS interface. This is left global so that it is guaranteed to be within the AXI SRAM with the aurora\+\_\+sram.\+lds linker file. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}
